Home.textAbout: I am a Systems Development Technician, graduated from Senai Cimatec, where I built a solid foundation in programming and creating technological solutions. During my studies, I gained practical experience with technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, C, MySQL, Figma, and GitHub, while deepening my knowledge in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.I am seeking my first professional opportunity in the development field, where I can apply my knowledge, collaborate with experienced professionals, and contribute to innovative projects. My goal is to continually grow as a developer, delivering value and efficient solutions to every challenge.
